entity.description: Target objective for a user or a team for a specified time period.

attributes.name: goalId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the goal.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: ownerId
attributes.description: Enter the user or team who is assigned to manage the record. This field is updated every time the record is assigned to a different user.

attributes.name: owningBusinessUnit
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the business unit that owns the record.

attributes.name: owningUser
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the user who owns the record.

attributes.name: stateCode
attributes.description: Shows whether the goal is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled goals are read-only and can't be edited.

attributes.name: statusCode
attributes.description: Select the goal's status.

attributes.name: versionNumber
attributes.description: Version number of the goal.

attributes.name: importSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

attributes.name: overriddenCreatedOn
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Type a title or name that describes the goal.

attributes.name: fiscalPeriod
attributes.description: Select the fiscal period for the goal.

attributes.name: fiscalYear
attributes.description: Select the fiscal year for the goal that's being tracked.

attributes.name: goalStartDate
attributes.description: Enter the date and time when the period for tracking the goal begins.

attributes.name: goalEndDate
attributes.description: Enter the date when the goal ends.

attributes.name: goalOwnerId
attributes.description: Choose the user or team responsible for meeting the goal.

attributes.name: parentGoalId
attributes.description: Choose a parent goal if the current goal is a child goal. This sets up a parent-child relationship for reporting and analytics.

attributes.name: transactionCurrencyId
attributes.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

attributes.name: exchangeRate
attributes.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

attributes.name: metricId
attributes.description: Choose the metric for the goal. This metric determines how the goal is tracked.

attributes.name: treeId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the goal tree.

attributes.name: depth
attributes.description: Depth of the goal in the tree.

attributes.name: stretchTargetMoney
attributes.description: Select stretch target (money) of the goal to define a higher or difficult level of goal than the usual ones.

attributes.name: stretchTargetMoneyBase
attributes.description: Shows the stretch target (money) in base currency to indicate a higher or difficult level of goal than the usual ones.

attributes.name: stretchTargetDecimal
attributes.description: Select a stretch target (decimal) of the goal to define a higher or difficult level of goal than the usual ones.

attributes.name: stretchTargetInteger
attributes.description: Select the stretch target (integer) of the goal to define a higher or difficult level of goal than the usual ones.

attributes.name: targetMoney
attributes.description: Select a goal target (money) to track a monetary amount such as revenue from a product.

attributes.name: targetMoneyBase
attributes.description: Shows the goal target of the money type in base currency.

attributes.name: targetDecimal
attributes.description: Select a goal target of the decimal type to use for tracking data that include partial numbers, such as pounds sold of a product sold by weight.

attributes.name: targetInteger
attributes.description: Select a goal target of the integer type to use for tracking anything countable in whole numbers, such as units sold.

attributes.name: actualMoney
attributes.description: Shows the actual value (Money type) achieved towards the target as of the last rolled-up date. This field appears when the metric type of the goal is Amount and the amount data type is Money.

attributes.name: actualMoneyBase
attributes.description: Shows the actual value (money type) in base currency to track goal results against the target.

attributes.name: customRollupFieldMoney
attributes.description: Indicates a placeholder rollup field for a money value to track a third category of results other than actuals and in-progress results.

attributes.name: customRollupFieldMoneyBase
attributes.description: Indicates a placeholder rollup field for a money value in base currency to track a third category of results other than actuals and in-progress results.

attributes.name: inProgressMoney
attributes.description: Shows the in-progress value (money) against the target. This value could contribute to a goal, but is not counted yet as actual.

attributes.name: inProgressMoneyBase
attributes.description: Shows the in-progress value (money) in base currency to track goal results against the target.

attributes.name: actualDecimal
attributes.description: Shows the actual value (Decimal type) achieved towards the target as of the last rolled-up date. This field appears when the metric type of the goal is Amount and the amount data type is Decimal.

attributes.name: customRollupFieldDecimal
attributes.description: Indicates a placeholder rollup field for a decimal value to track a third category of results other than actuals and in-progress results.

attributes.name: inProgressDecimal
attributes.description: Shows the in-progress value (decimal) against the target. This value could contribute to a goal, but is not counted yet as actual.

attributes.name: actualInteger
attributes.description: Shows the actual value (integer) achieved towards the target as of the last rolled-up date. This field appears when the metric type of the goal is Amount or Count and the amount data type is Integer.

attributes.name: customRollupFieldInteger
attributes.description: Indicates a placeholder rollup field for an integer value to track a third category of results other than actuals and in-progress results.

attributes.name: inProgressInteger
attributes.description: Shows the in-progress value (integer) against the target. This value could contribute to a goal, but is not counted yet as actual.

attributes.name: percentage
attributes.description: Shows the percentage achieved against the target goal.

attributes.name: isFiscalPeriodGoal
attributes.description: Select whether the goal period is a fiscal period or custom period.

attributes.name: considerOnlyGoalOwnersRecords
attributes.description: Select whether only the goal owner's records, or all records, should be rolled up for goal results.

attributes.name: lastRolledupDate
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the goal was last rolled up. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: targetString
attributes.description: Target value of the goal.

attributes.name: stretchTargetString
attributes.description: Stretch target value for all data types.

attributes.name: actualString
attributes.description: Actual Value of the goal.

attributes.name: customRollupFieldString
attributes.description: Placeholder rollup field for the goal.

attributes.name: inProgressString
attributes.description: In-progress value of the goal.

attributes.name: owningTeam
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the team who owns the goal.

attributes.name: amountDataType
attributes.description: Data type of the amount.

attributes.name: isAmount
attributes.description: Indicates whether the metric type is Count or Amount.

attributes.name: rollupQueryActualIntegerId
attributes.description: Choose the query that will be used to calculate the actual data for the goal (integer).

attributes.name: rollUpQueryActualMoneyId
attributes.description: Choose the query that will be used to calculate the actual data for the goal (money).

attributes.name: rollUpQueryActualDecimalId
attributes.description: Choose the query that will be used to calculate the actual data for the goal (decimal).

attributes.name: rollUpQueryCustomIntegerId
attributes.description: Choose the query that will be used to calculate data for the custom rollup field (integer).

attributes.name: rollUpQueryCustomMoneyId
attributes.description: Choose the query that will be used to calculate data for the custom rollup field (money).

attributes.name: rollUpQueryCustomDecimalId
attributes.description: Choose the query that will be used to calculate data for the custom rollup field (decimal).

attributes.name: rollUpQueryInprogressIntegerId
attributes.description: Choose the query that will be used to calculate data for the in-progress rollup field (integer).

attributes.name: rollUpQueryInprogressMoneyId
attributes.description: Choose the query that will be used to calculate data for the in-progress rollup field (money).

attributes.name: rollUpQueryInprogressDecimalId
attributes.description: Choose the query that will be used to calculate data for the in-progress rollup field (decimal).

attributes.name: rollupOnlyFromChildGoals
attributes.description: Select whether the data should be rolled up only from the child goals.
attributes.displayName: Roll Up Only from Child Goals

attributes.name: goalWithErrorId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the goal that caused an error in the rollup of the goal hierarchy.

attributes.name: rollupErrorCode
attributes.description: Error code associated with rollup.

attributes.name: computedTargetAsOfTodayPercentageAchieved
attributes.description: Shows the expected value for percentage achieved against the target goal as of the current date.

attributes.name: computedTargetAsOfTodayMoney
attributes.description: Shows the expected amount for actual value (money type) against the target goal as of the current date.

attributes.name: computedTargetAsOfTodayMoneyBase
attributes.description: Shows the expected amount in base currency for actual value (money type) against the target goal as of the current date.

attributes.name: computedTargetAsOfTodayDecimal
attributes.description: Shows the expected amount for actual value (decimal type) against the target goal.

attributes.name: computedTargetAsOfTodayInteger
attributes.description: Shows the expected amount for actual value (integer type) against the target goal as of the current date.

attributes.name: isOverride
attributes.description: Indicates whether the values of system rollup fields can be updated.

attributes.name: isOverridden
attributes.description: Select whether the system rollup fields are updated. If set to Yes, the next system rollup will not update the values of the rollup fields with the system calculated values.

attributes.name: entityImageId
attributes.description: For internal use only.
